title: Silicon Valley’s secret super PAC
description:
A little-known Democratic super PAC, Future Forward, is backed by some of Silicon Valley’s biggest donors. And they’re sponsoring TV ads in the final weeks of the presidential campaign to oust President Donald Trump. Recode’s Teddy Schleifer explains why.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

itunes:subtitle: Why Silicon Valley megadonors are spending big money on TV ads
